events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product has a large scratch on the surface and does not look new.
The reported problem has been identified as a product defect based on the customer's description of damage.
Assigning this case to customer service agent Emily for handling the product defect complaint.
Hello! I’m Emily from customer support. Sorry to hear about the scratch on your product. I’m here to help resolve this for you.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched product and your order number so I can verify and assist you further?
Thank you. I have attached pictures of the scratched product and included my order number in this message.
We can offer you a replacement for the damaged item free of charge or a full refund if you prefer. Please let us know your choice.
I would prefer to get a replacement sent as soon as possible, thank you for the quick response.
Your replacement order has been processed and will be shipped out within the next 24 hours. We apologize for the inconvenience.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the replacement product and that everything is satisfactory now.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday and it's perfect, thank you for your excellent support!
Closing the case as the replacement has been delivered and the customer confirmed satisfaction with the resolution.
